citations.desc: CLEANING, SANITIZATION, HOUSEKEEPING, AND PEST CONTROL.
citations.narrative:
The dirty side of the cage wash area (Q building) is very crowded with cages that need to be cleaned and sanitized.
Debris from the dirty cages has spilled onto the floor and is being tracked into the hallway near the animal rooms.
The hallways must be kept clean and debris from dirty cages must be promptly cleaned from floors to maintain
husbandrry practices.
CORRECT BY : 5-7-14
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with facility veterinarians.
